community.unauthorizedPermissionsChange: U bent niet bevoegd om de rechten van deze gebruiker te bewerken

virtualContributors.externalVCsInfo: At the moment, only Alkemio Support can add an external $t(common.virtualContributor) to your $t(common.space). Please contact Support <click>here</click> if you wish to do so, we are happy to help!
virtualContributors.permissionRequiredTooltip: To use $t(common.virtualContributors), please upgrade your license or contact the Alkemio team for assistance.

application-form.title: Aanmeldingsformulier
application-form.subtitle:
This section allows you to modify the questions for users applying to the $t(common.space).
Please note that these questions will only be shown when the $t(common.membership) options (in the block above) are set to "Applications required"
application-form.move-down: Vraag één positie naar beneden verplaatsen

communityGuidelines.title: $t(common.Community) guidelines
communityGuidelines.saveAndDeleteContentSuccessMessage: $t(common.Community) guidelines content removed and saved successfully.
communityGuidelines.adminsOnly: Since there are no $t(common.community) guidelines specified, this block is only visible for $t(common.admins) and $t(common.leads).
communityGuidelines.communityGuidelinesRedirect: Click here to update the $t(common.community) guidelines in the $t(common.space) $t(common.settings).

confirmationDialog.title: Updating $t(common.community) guidelines
confirmationDialog.description: Are you sure you want to replace your existing $t(common.community) guidelines? This action cannot be undone.

community.applicationsHelp: Here you can find everyone that applied to become a $t(common.member) of this $t(common.space). By clicking on them you can review their application and accept or reject them.

users.title: Nodig anderen uit voor '{{spaceName}}'
users.description: Zoek naar gebruikers hieronder of voeg hun e-mailadres direct toe
users.note: Houd er rekening mee dat je persoonlijke e-mailadres zichtbaar is voor iedereen die je een bericht stuurt.
users.defaultWelcomeMessage: Hi, I would like to invite you to {{spaceName}}. Have a look at the $t(common.space) or click on the button below to directly accept or decline the invitation.
users.success: Je uitnodiging is succesvol verzonden naar de volgende ontvangers:
users.failure: We konden de uitnodiging niet naar de volgende ontvangers sturen:
users.invitationByEmailTooltip: {{email}} will be invited to sign up to Alkemio and to this $t(common.space)

results.ALREADY_INVITED_TO_PLATFORM_AND_ROLE_SET: Er is al een open uitnodiging/aanmelding
results.INVITATION_TO_PARENT_NOT_AUTHORIZED: Invitation to the parent $t(common.community) was not authorized

validationErrors.required: Voeg ten minste één bijdrager toe om uit te nodigen
validationErrors.invalidAddress: Verwijder ongeldige invoer om verder te gaan

vcs.title: $t(common.virtualContributors) Store
vcs.defaultVCInvitationMessage: Hi, I would like to invite your $t(common.virtualContributor) {{name}} to {{space}}. Have a look at the $t(common.space) or click on the button below to directly accept or decline the invitation.
vcs.vcFetchErrorMessage: An error occurred while fetching the $t(common.virtualContributors)

application.title: Aanmelding van '{{user}}' verwijderen
application.content: Weet je zeker dat je deze aanmelding wilt archiveren? De aanmeldingen zal worden afgewezen als dat nog niet gebeurd was.

invitation.title: Uitnodiging voor '{{user}}' verwijderen
invitation.content: Weet je zeker dat je deze uitnodiging wilt verwijderen? De uitnodiging wordt verwijderd als dat nog niet gebeurd was.

platformInvitation.title: Uitnodiging voor '{{user}}' verwijderen
platformInvitation.content: Weet je zeker dat je deze uitnodiging wilt verwijderen? De uitnodiging wordt verwijderd als dat nog niet gebeurd was.

approve.title: Aanmelding van {{user}} goedkeuren
approve.content: Are you sure that you want to Approve this application? The user will be added to the $t(common.space) and will be able to access it.

reject.title: Aanmelding van {{user}} afwijzen
reject.content: Are you sure that you want to Reject this application? The user will not be able to access the $t(common.space).

memberSettings.title: $t(common.Member) $t(common.settings)
memberSettings.lead: This $t(common.member) is a $t(common.lead): Leads are shown as the $t(common.hosts) of the $t(common.community).
memberSettings.admin: This $t(common.member) is an $t(common.admin): (s)he has the right to administer this $t(common.community) and all of its content and contributors.
memberSettings.maxLeadsWarning: Note that there is a specific maximum number of $t(common.leads) for the communities. If the maximum number if reached, this option will be disabled for others.

removeMember.remove: Click here to remove this user from this $t(common.community). Be careful, this action cannot be undone.
removeMember.dialogTitle: Are you sure you want to remove this $t(common.member)?
removeMember.dialogContent: By clicking CONFIRM, {{member}} will be removed from this $t(common.community) and all the underlying $t(common.subspaces) {{memberFirstName}} may be $t(common.member) of. {{memberFirstName}}’s contributions will remain in place.

removeGuidelinesConfirmationDialog.title: Remove $t(common.community) guidelines content
removeGuidelinesConfirmationDialog.content: Are you sure you want to remove the $t(common.community) guidelines? This action cannot be undone.

unableToAddMemberInfo.title: Unable To Add $t(common.member)
unableToAddMemberInfo.content: This $t(common.member) must be added to the parent $t(common.space) first.

associates-view.sign-in: Please sign in to see the users that are associated with this $t(common.organization).
